title: 608 - A Fistful of Datas | Sleep With TNG
description:
The ancient west is the setting for a father, son and Troi adventure. But it will be Geordi’s burgeoning beard you dream of. (Trek talk at about 17:10)

Thanks to all the listeners who give “value for value” by becoming patrons on Patreon @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron

   

Check out my favorite piece of tech, the Echo Dot http://amzn.to/2yaP8JK (affiliate link)
